content: blanket designed for the event at the yarn dispensary faversham wwkipd 2018 https //theyarndispensary co uk/ a free pattern in 11 different sizes although dk used any size yarn and 1 size smaller needle than recommended can be used as the pattern is written by row and stitch yardage would then vary a very easy pattern which can have repeats added to or taken away smaller sizes can be used as bonding squares wash cloths or loveys with the larger sizes fitting small beds 20x27 30x41 40x54 50x67 60x81 70x95 80x109 90x125 100x138 110x151 120x165 cm 70 160 280 430 620 860 1100 1440 1800 2150 2500m dk yarn
